eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\label{Defmatr1} \left(\begin{array}{c}
  A_-(\beta) \\
  \bar{A}_-(\beta) \\
  A_+(-\beta) \\
  \bar{A}_+(-\beta)
\end{array}\right)=\left(\begin{array}{cc}
  R(\beta,\kappa) & T(\beta,\kappa) \\
  T(\beta,\kappa) & R(\beta,\kappa)
\end{array}\right)\left(\begin{array}{c}
  A_-(-\beta) \\
  \bar{A}_-(-\beta) \\
  A_+(\beta) \\
  \bar{A}_+(\beta)
\end{array}\right)\, ,
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{res}&& R_A^A\simeq
R_{\bar{A}}^{\bar{A}}\simeq T_{A}^{A}\simeq T_{\bar{A}}^{\bar{A}}\simeq
\frac{i}{2}\cdot
\frac{\sin\chi\,\cos\chi}{\beta-i\chi} \nonumber\\
&&R_A^A\simeq R_{\bar{A}}^{\bar{A}}\simeq T_{A}^{A}\simeq
T_{\bar{A}}^{\bar{A}}\simeq\frac{i}{2}\cdot
\frac{-\sin\chi\,\cos\chi}{\beta-i(\pi-\chi)}\, . \

\begin{eqnarray} \Phi(z\,
e^{2\pi i},\bar{z}\, e^{-2\pi i})\mu_\alpha(0,0)&=&e^{2\pi i
\alpha}\Phi(z,\bar{z})\mu_\alpha(0,0)\,,\nonumber\\
\bar{\Phi}(z\, e^{2\pi i},\bar{z}\, e^{-2\pi
i})\mu_\alpha(0,0)&=&e^{-2\pi i
\alpha}\bar{\Phi}(z,\bar{z})\mu_\alpha(0,0)\, .\

g_1^\alpha&=&h_1^\alpha\nonumber\\
g_{12}^\alpha&=&h_{12}^\alpha+h_1^\alpha h_2^\alpha\nonumber\\
g_{123}^\alpha&=&h_{123}^\alpha+ h_{12}^\alpha h_3^{\alpha}+ h_{23}^\alpha
h_1^{\alpha}+h_{31}^\alpha h_2^{\alpha}+ h_1^\alpha h_2^\alpha h_3^\alpha\,.\
